name: The End Is Here
description:
NOTE: On Mac OS please use Chrome instead of Safari for a proper experience

A submission for the r/SoloDevelopment Winter Game Jam.

The glaciers melted. Save who you can. A mix of Snake and Dodge the Sheep. On the water.

  • Steer your boat and automatically throw buoys to save the animals
  • You have to get close enough to throw the buoy but not close enough to hit them
  • They'll chain behind you with a rope and eventually turn into obstacles themselves
  • Try to save everyone without crashing into anyone

Music by Samuel Campoli
